content: I probably have asked this before, but is there any way to force a suggestion to not be inline, and instead be in its own diagnostic subwindow? There doesn't seem to be a SuggestionStyle for that...
And, what are the criteria for a suggestion to automatically be put in its own window?
I think you want SuggestionStyle::ShowAlways. You can use span_suggestion_verbose which sets that style
Ah, thanks, that seems right. The docs for that could be improved... perhaps I'll go do that :)
